name: NFTCloud
description: NFTCloud is a platform that offers a Suite of Tools for all Web3 entrepreneurs, creators, and enthusiasts. In addition to our tools and services, NFTCloud offers the Enchanting Box Collection, a collection of stunning works of art packaged in charming boxes that also serve as an investment that generates passive income for its owners. We offer solutions for everyone to create their own tokens and NFTs, and exploit them in few seconds. In accordance with the Product Owner's requirements, successfully generated tokens on NFTCloud will be verified, published on token explorer websites, and automatically listed on DEXs
